Marketplace.title: Marketplace
Marketplace.welcome: Explore available produce from local farmers.

ListCropForm.title: List Your Crop
ListCropForm.instructions: Fill in the details of your produce for sale.
ListCropForm.descriptionPlaceholder: Add more details about your produce (quality, variety, etc.)
ListCropForm.successMessage: Your crop has been listed successfully!

errors.quantityRequired: Quantity is required and must be positive
errors.priceRequired: Price is required and must be positive
errors.notAuthenticated: You must be signed in to create a listing
errors.submissionFailed: Failed to create listing. Please try again.

MarketPrices.title: Market Prices
MarketPrices.description: View current market prices for various agricultural commodities.
MarketPrices.selectBothPrompt: Please select both a crop and a market to view price information.

errors.loadingCrops: Error loading crops. Please try again.
errors.loadingMarkets: Error loading markets. Please try again.
errors.loadingPrice: Error loading price data. Please try again.
errors.priceNotFound: No price information found for the selected combination.
errors.generalError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

CropAdvisory.title: Crop Advisory
CropAdvisory.description: Access expert advice on crop management techniques and best practices.
CropAdvisory.contentNotFound: The requested content was not found.

errors.loadingTopics: Error loading advisory topics. Please try again.
errors.loadingContent: Error loading advisory content. Please try again.
errors.contentNotFound: The requested advisory content was not found.
errors.generalError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

PostHarvest.title: Post-Harvest Guidance
PostHarvest.description: Learn about best practices for handling and storing your harvest to reduce losses and maintain quality.
PostHarvest.contentNotFound: The requested content was not found.

errors.loadingTopics: Error loading post-harvest topics. Please try again.
errors.loadingContent: Error loading post-harvest content. Please try again.
errors.contentNotFound: The requested post-harvest content was not found.
errors.generalError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

TransportRequest.title: Request Transportation
TransportRequest.instructions: Fill in the details of your transportation request.
TransportRequest.produceTypePlaceholder: Enter type of produce (e.g., Wheat, Rice)
TransportRequest.pickupLocationPlaceholder: Enter where the produce will be picked up
TransportRequest.destinationLocationPlaceholder: Enter where the produce should be delivered
TransportRequest.successMessage: Your transportation request has been submitted successfully!

errors.dateInPast: Date cannot be in the past
errors.notAuthenticated: You must be signed in to request transportation
errors.submissionFailed: Failed to submit request. Please try again.

BrowseTransporters.title: Browse Transporters
BrowseTransporters.description: Find transporters available in your area to move your produce to market.
BrowseTransporters.contactInfoNote: Contact details may be provided only after a transportation request is confirmed

errors.loadingTransporters: Error loading transporters. Please try again.
errors.generalError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

Feedback.title: Submit Feedback
Feedback.instructions: We value your feedback! Let us know how we can improve your experience with AgriConnect.
Feedback.commentsPlaceholder: Tell us what you liked or how we can improve...
Feedback.pageContextLabel: Which page or feature is this feedback about? (Optional)
Feedback.pageContextHelp: Leave blank if your feedback is about the overall app
Feedback.successMessage: Thank you for your feedback! Your insights help us improve AgriConnect.
Feedback.anonymousFeedbackNote: You are submitting feedback anonymously. Sign in if you'd like us to follow up with you directly.

errors.submissionFailed: Failed to submit feedback. Please try again.
